DEFECT.DESCRIPTION: The function being assigned or passed should be a KSTART_ROUTINE function: Add the declaration 'KSTART_ROUTINE RegReadThread;' before the current first declaration of RegReadThread.
Consider using 'ExAllocatePoolWithTag' instead of 'ExAllocatePool'. Reason: No tag interferes with debugging..
Consider using 'ExAllocatePoolWithTag' instead of 'ExAllocatePool'. Reason: No tag interferes with debugging..
The function being assigned or passed should be a KSTART_ROUTINE function: Add the declaration 'KSTART_ROUTINE RegWriteThread;' before the current first declaration of RegWriteThread.
